data.text: @PureBloodKiwi The majority of South Africa have already had covid so have natural immunity
@PureBloodKiwi We will go ahead and ignore the ridiculously strict lockdowns, travel restrictions and social measures put in place to stop it in its tracks then. OK. Yay to no vaccine!

@PureBloodKiwi Oh yes...you may want to look at other stats including age of population and exposure to malaria drugs...if you were truly into science rather than selective science to suit...you may find that illuminating if you had a critical thinking brain.
